item.title: Update README.md
item.description: https://www.activepieces.com - Build automation flows to connect several apps together in the backend of your app. For example, when an event fires in your app, send a Slack message or add a Google Sheet row. Free up to 5,000 tasks per month.

item.title: Update README.md
item.description: https://gamefresco.com/ - Discover, collect and share free game assets from game artists everywhere.

item.title: Add emaildrop.io to Emails section
item.description: https://emaildrop.io/ - Free disposable email provider. Email addresses can be created via GraphQL API.

item.title: Add Feathery to the Forms section
item.description: https://feathery.io - Powerful, developer-friendly form builder. Build signup & login, user onboarding, payment flows, complex financial applications, and more. Free plan allows up to 250 submissions / month and 5 active forms.

item.title: Add Bencher
item.description: https://bencher.dev/ - A suite of continuous benchmarking tools designed to catch performance regressions in CI. Free for all public projects.

item.title: Add OpenAPI.security
item.description: https://openapi.security/ - Free tool to quickly check the security of any OpenAPI / Swagger based API. No signup required.

item.title: Describe free level

item.title: Add Clockwork Micro
item.description:
https://www.notion.so/ - Notion is a note-taking and collaboration application with markdown support that also integrates tasks, wikis, and databases. The company describes the app as an all-in-one workspace for note-taking, project management and task management. In addition to cross-platform apps, it can be accessed via most web browsers.
https://clockworkmicro.com/ - — Map tools that work like clockwork.
